#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define ll long long

#ifdef ONLINE_JUDGE
    #define g getchar_unlocked
    #define p putchar_unlocked
#else
   #define g getchar
   #define p putchar
#endif
 
 
 
inline ll int rd()
{
    ll x=0;
    int sign=1;
    char c;
    while(((c=g())<'0'||c>'9')&&c!='-');
    if(c=='-')
    sign=-1,c=g();
    while(c>='0'&&c<='9')
    x=(x<<3)+(x<<1)+c-48,c=g();
    return sign*x;
}
 
int main() {
  long int n,l[10000],k,i,j,a,ans;
  n=rd();
  while(n!=0)
  {for(i=0;i<n;i++)
  l[i]=rd();
  ans=0;
  sort(l,l+n);
  for(i=0;i<n-2;i++)
 { for(j=i+1;j<n-1;j++)
  {k=l[i]+l[j];
 for(a=j+1;a<n;a++)
      if(k<l[a])
        {ans=ans+n-a;
            break;
        }  }}
        cout<<ans<<"\n";
  
      cin>>n;
  
  
  
       
   }


    

	// your code goes here
	return 0;
}
